name: AFGBuildableCheatFluidSink
comment: Base for cheat building that sinks an infinite amount of fluid.

methods.name: GetMaxContent
methods.comment: Get the maximum fluid content this building can hold. [m3]

properties.name: mSinkRate
properties.comment: Sink rate of the fluid, 0 means sink everything. [m3/s]

properties.name: mMeasuredSinkRate
properties.comment: Actual sink rate of the fluid. [m3/s]

properties.name: mMinimumContent
properties.comment: Sink only if the content is above this threshold.

properties.name: mMinimumPressure
properties.comment: Sink only if the pressure is above this threshold.

properties.name: mFluidBox
properties.comment: Simulation data for this fluid integrant.
